languages.text: "Воистину, это место нас не балует. Но такие, как мы, выдерживают все. У нас просто нет иного выбора".

traits.locale_text: "Воистину, это место нас не балует. Но такие, как мы, выдеживают все. У нас просто нет иного выбора".

languages.text: "This place has certainly not been kind to us. But people like us will endure anything. Because we have no other choice."
languages.original_text: "Воистину, это место нас не балует. Но такие, как мы, выдерживают все. У нас просто нет иного выбора".

traits.locale_text: "This place has certainly not been kind to us. But people like us will endure anything. Because we have no other choice."
"This place has certainly not been kind to us. But people like us will endure anything. Because we have no other choice."
"This place has certainly not been kind to us. But people like us will endure anything. Because we have no other choice."
"This place has certainly not been kind to us. But people like us will endure anything. Because we have no other choice."
"This place has certainly not been kind to us. But people like us will endure anything. Because we have no other choice."
"This place has certainly not been kind to us. But people like us will endure anything. Because we have no other choice."

languages.text: 「この場所は、私たちにとってまるで優しくありませんでした。ですが私たちのような人間は、どのようなことにも耐えることができます。他に選択肢がないのですから」
languages.original_text: "This place has certainly not been kind to us. But people like us will endure anything. Because we have no other choice."

traits.locale_text: 「この場所は、私たちにとってまるで優しくありませんでした。ですが私たちのような人間は、どのようなことにも耐えることができます。他に選択肢がないのですから」

languages.text: "Uns ist es hier wirklich nicht gut ergangen. Aber Leute wie wir überstehen alles. Weil wir keine andere Wahl haben."
languages.original_text: "This place has certainly not been kind to us. But people like us will endure anything. Because we have no other choice."

traits.locale_text: "Uns ist es hier wirklich nicht gut ergangen. Aber Leute wie wir überstehen alles. Weil wir keine andere Wahl haben."

languages.text: « Il est vrai que cet endroit n'y est pas allé de mainmorte avec nous, mais nous sommes capables de tout endurer, car nous n'avons pas le choix. »
languages.original_text: "This place has certainly not been kind to us. But people like us will endure anything. Because we have no other choice."

traits.locale_text: « Il est vrai que cet endroit n'y est pas allé de mainmorte avec nous, mais nous sommes capables de tout endurer, car nous n'avons pas le choix. »

languages.text: «Sin duda este lugar nos ha hecho sufrir. Pero los individuos como nosotros lo soportamos todo. Porque no tenemos elección».
languages.original_text: "This place has certainly not been kind to us. But people like us will endure anything. Because we have no other choice."

traits.locale_text: «Sin duda este lugar nos ha hecho sufrir. Pero los individuos como nosotros lo soportamos todo. Porque no tenemos elección».

languages.text: “这个地方确实相当糟糕，但像我们这样的人，什么样的困境都能熬过去，因为我们别无选择。”
languages.original_text: "This place has certainly not been kind to us. But people like us will endure anything. Because we have no other choice."

traits.locale_text: “这个地方确实相当糟糕，但像我们这样的人，什么样的困境都能熬过去，因为我们别无选择。”

languages.text: "Burası bize uğurlu gelmedi ama biz dirayetliyiz, her şeye dayanırız. Çünkü başka çaremiz yok."
languages.original_text: "This place has certainly not been kind to us. But people like us will endure anything. Because we have no other choice."

traits.locale_text: "Burası bize uğurlu gelmedi ama biz dirayetliyiz, her şeye dayanırız. Çünkü başka çaremiz yok."

languages.original_text: "This place has certainly not been kind to us. But people like us will endure anything. Because we have no other choice."
